metadata.title: CVE-2022-20470 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In bindRemoteViewsService of AppWidgetServiceImpl.java, there is a possibleway to bypass background activity launch due to improper input validation.This could lead to local escalation of privilege with no additionalexecution privileges needed. User interaction is not needed forexploitation.Product: AndroidVersions: Android-10 Android-11 Android-12Android-12L Android-13Android ID: A-234013191
